name: list-of-entertaining-data-related-youtube-videos
title: List of 'entertaining' data related youtube videos
description: This dataset contains records of data, open data, blockchain and bitcoin inspired entertainment youtube videos. The list contains links to the videos and channels for your viewing pleasure. It is by no means complete or comprehensive. It was inspired in equal measures by Peter Wells (@peterkwells) and whimsy. A google sheets version is available here for editing: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oYXcKM-K7ixzUF67rsL98FbBxAiSaxetVfCfgpzVqrk/edit?usp=sharing
